00066 public:
00068         ErrorFunction()

00070                 epsilon = 1e-2;
00071         }

00075         {
00076         }

00079         //===========================================================================
00101         virtual double error(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target) = 0;
00102 
00103         //===========================================================================
00146         virtual double errorDerivative(Model& model, const Array<double>& input, const Array<double>& target, Array<double>& derivative)
00147         {
00148                 int i, ic = model.getParameterDimension();
00149                 derivative.resize(ic, false);
00150 
00151                 double ret = error(model, input, target);
00152                 double temp, eps, e;
00153                 for (i=0; i<ic; i++)
00154                 {
00155                         temp = model.getParameter(i);
00156                         eps = epsilon * temp;
00157                         model.setParameter(i, temp + eps);
00158                         e = error(model, input, target);
00159                         derivative(i) = (e - ret) / eps;
00160                         model.setParameter(i, temp);
00161                 }
00162 
00163                 return ret;
00164         }
00165 
00166         //===========================================================================
00188         inline void setEpsilon (double eps)
00189         { 
00190                 epsilon = eps; 
00191         };
00192 
00193 protected:
00195         double epsilon;
00196 };
